mapper.insert: insert into member( m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_phone, m_email, m_level, m_cname, m_zip, m_addr1, m_addr2, m_pname, m_account, m_bank, m_sysdate, m_check )values( #{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, #{m_phone}, #{m_email}, #{m_level}, #{m_cname}, #{m_zip}, #{m_addr1}, #{m_addr2}, #{m_pname}, #{m_account}, #{m_bank}, sysdate, '0' )

insert into place ( p_no, p_manager, p_pname, p_place, p_explain, p_price, i_no, p_max, p_area, p_op1, p_op2, p_op3, p_op4, p_op5, p_op6, p_date )values( PLACE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{p_manager}, #{p_pname}, #{p_place}, #{p_explain}, #{p_price}, #{i_no}, #{p_max}, #{p_area}, #{p_op1}, #{p_op2}, #{p_op3}, #{p_op4}, #{p_op5}, #{p_op6}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update place SET p_pname=#{p_pname}, p_place=#{p_place}, p_explain=#{p_explain}, p_price=#{p_price}, i_no=#{i_no}, p_max=#{p_max}, p_area=#{p_area}, p_op1=#{p_op1}, p_op2=#{p_op2}, p_op3=#{p_op3}, p_op4=#{p_op4}, p_op5=#{p_op5}, p_op6=#{p_op6}, p_date=sysdate where p_no=#{p_no}

update member SET m_pw=#{m_pw}, m_name=#{m_name}, m_phone=#{m_phone}, m_email=#{m_email}, m_cname=#{m_cname}, m_zip=#{m_zip}, m_addr1=#{m_addr1}, m_addr2=#{m_addr2}, m_pname=#{m_pname}, m_bank=#{m_bank}, m_account=#{m_account} where m_id=#{m_id}
